Class Piece

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • model.Piece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BishopPiece, KingPiece, KnightPiece, PawnPiece, QueenPiece, RookPiece

    public abstract class Piece
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements java.io.Serializable
    Egy bábut reprezentál és a hozzá közhető feladatokat látja el
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
